      • addSongatOne

        public void addSongatOne(Song mySongToPlayList)
        Allows to add a song to the arrangement of songs in each PlayList.
        pre: At least one user, one song and one PlayList must be created.
        post: The song has been added to the PlayList.
        Parameters:
        mySongToPlayList - song to be added. mySongToPlayList = the song must be in the array of songs in the MCS.

      • uptadeGender

        public Gender[] uptadeGender()
        Allows to store the genres of the songs that are in the PlayList.
        pre: At least one user, one song and one PlayList must be created.
        post: The genre of the song has been added to the genders array.
        Returns:
        newsGenders.

      • changeGender

        public java.lang.String changeGender(Gender[] newsGenders)
        Allows to erase the repeated genders found in the Genders array.
        pre: At least one user, one song and one PlayList must be created.
        post: Genres without repetition.
        Parameters:
        newsGenders - the array Genders. newsGenders = ROCK, HIPHOP, MUSICACLASICA, RAGGAE, SALSA, METAL, DESCONOCIDO.
        Returns:
        genderUptade.

      • uptadeDuration

        public int uptadeDuration()
        Allows to update the duration of the PlayList according to the songs added to the PlayList.
        pre: At least one user, one song and one PlayList must be created.
        post: The duration has been updated and is in seconds.
        Returns:
        newSecondsTotal.

      • uptadeDurationFormat

        public java.lang.String uptadeDurationFormat(int newSecondsTotal)
        Allows to transform the PlayList duration in seconds to the MM:SS format.
        pre: At least one user, one song and one PlayList must be created.
        post: The duration has been updated to MM:SS format.
        Parameters:
        newSecondsTotal - the duration PlayList in seconds. newSecondsTotal = greater than 0
        Returns:
        newTime.

      • showDatePlayList

        public java.lang.String showDatePlayList()

        post: Show general data PlayList.
        Returns:
        dataPlayList.
